Title: aiocpa contains credential harvesting code
Description: aiocpa is a user-facing library for generating color gradients of text. Version 0.1.13 introduced obfuscated, malicious code targeting Crypto Pay users, forwarding client credentials to a remote Telegram bot. All versions have been removed from PyPI.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 0.1.13 up to 0.1.14
Solution: Unfortunately, there is no solution available yet.
